attributes.action: Petition against increase of road tax and council tax!
attributes.background: Struggling to pay my bills already, why are they making things more difficult for normal households. I'm sure a lot of people will be in similar situation.

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

Local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament, set the rates of council tax in their local area. 

You may wish to sign this existing petition on Vehicle Excise Duty:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177685
